Articles.Content:
Hello. I'm going to ask a dumb question.

I'd there a mod that sits in the middle between say Smart Parts and KOS?

I'm in the beginning of a new career game and would like to add some simple automation. For example, with RemoteTech , automatically switching antennae when I lose connection, or automatically running certain experiments when the conditions are right. I hope you get the idea.

I feel KOs  can do this, but not to sound dumb or lazy, but when I read the documentation, it feels like I should go to college to learn programming. Also that I should be smart enough to get into college. Neither of those are happening.

I've been searching with no luck, so I figured I'd ask, is there a mod that allows simpler scripting for basic tasks than KOs?

Failing that, I'll have to start learning programming... I learned Basic in elementary school several decades ago , lol ... Can't be that bad, right?

Thx all.
